name: 菲尔·麦克福尔
name_full: 菲尔·麦克福尔  Phil McFall
introduction: After years of serving as a Firefighter, EMT, and SWAT-Medic in the Rocky Mountains of Colorado, Phil brought his experiences and skills to consulting behind the scenes and on screen. While working on American Rust (September 2021) he caught the eye of the Director and was quickly cast for a recurring role in the final 3 episodes. Since then, Phil has worked for numerous productions, a role in a soon-to-be released Indie, and a Paramount + series. Stay tuned for more.
